resources.string: Discover Dresden\'s landmarks through historical narratives.

Step into Dresden\'s rich history with personalized guides who bring the city\'s landmarks to life. Take photos, collect memories, and uncover stories at each location. Your journey through Dresden\'s cultural heritage starts here.

This project is part of the Mobile Cartography course at the Technical University of Dresden, developed under the International Masters in Cartography program. Supervised by Prof. Eva, the project explores innovative cartographic design for mobile applications.
